wait a second.. the new Cass icon looks like {{champion:62}} if he were a female
riot please stop killing champ lore. the updated bios are so much worse then their predecessors.

I completely agree. The updated bios are horrible. I love the lore because it gives the champions character; it explains things about them that make you understand the champion more. The new bios don't give any backstory or explain anything. The video about Cassiopeia and Sivir should be what we read about in the lore. Giving a single paragraph to vaguely describe the basics of a champion is lazy. Rammus has it the worst. The lore is supposed to answer questions, not pose new questions that will never get answered. Riot, please fix this. I love the lore and backstories. Don't kill it.

Did anyone else notice?
Come on an Slam.
Welcome to the Slam.
It's time to Slam Jam.

Space Jam is da boss <3
HEY YOU, WHATCHAT GON DO?
Do the Vayne/Gnar/Poppy updates work on allied terrain only or enemy too? If it's the latter, I'm never playing Jarvan against Gnar...
"player-created terrain" {{champion:150}} suddenly hard counters {{champion:59}}
Aww the Rammus and Amumu wards won't come out this patch? {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}
Riot, when are we getting a new Jinx skin????
Okay, now if they don't play some of the Space Jam soundtrack at Worlds, I'm going to be disappointed. Make it happen, Riot.
I've read the new lores and they are weak as can be, it looks like no effort was put into them with how short and vague they are.
Seriously, They are a couple lines of garbage. Maybe if they added the new stuff to the original lore it'd be ok.
it's cool if they change the lore, but these new ones just seem lazy, you don't have to focus on how they got into the league that's fine, but at this point all they did was remove content.
Power overwhelming! *protoss voice*
Uhhhh, what about the warwick glitch after you ult and you try to Q it doesn't work? where is the patch on that?

Hi riot...just wanted to comment on the update, more specifically, the bio/lore portion. I have to say that I don't like it at all. I read the Dev Blog about updating/reinventing the Runeterra lore, but this takes away the substance that the champions had. Instead of stories, tales, legends, and personalities that people connected with, you've given us nothing but shallow glimpses of what each warrior...it also affects my image of the League; now it seems like a bunch of misfits fighting in an arena...Please go back to the original lore.

Yours truly,
